channel.title: CVE Feed for WPDeveloper -- Essential Blocks for Gutenberg
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPDeveloper -- Essential Blocks for Gutenberg

item.title: CVE-2024-47385|2024-10-07T14:12:50.305Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20blocks%20for%20gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Blocks for Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Essential Blocks for Gutenberg: from n/a through 4.8.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-30467|2024-08-02T01:38:59.907Z -- wpdeveloper -- essential%20blocks%20for%20gutenberg
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Blocks for Gutenberg.This issue affects Essential Blocks for Gutenberg: from n/a through 4.4.9.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Blocks for Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Essential Blocks for Gutenberg: from n/a through 4.8.4.
